message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take a strong opening, but willing to negotiate
I'll give you a bigger chunk, but not that big, let's see what you think
I'll take a risk, but you're getting desperate, aren't you?
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a bigger chunk, don't take advantage of me!
You're getting close to desperation, but I'm not done yet
I'm almost out of options, but I'll give you the majority, don't crush me!
You're running out of time, but I'm not going to take the whole thing
I'm almost out of options, but I'll give you almost everything, please have mercy!
